bpp/descriptor.name: Zeitgeist Retail Private Limited
bpp/descriptor.short_desc: The ZEPP platform enables you to buy products directly from India's Top brands at specially discounted prices. The platform redirects your orders to the respective brand, who will deliver your product directly to your home, without any intermediaries. This ensures that you get the freshest products, at the best prices.
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Zeitgeist Retail Private Limited (ZRPL) is an E-Commerce Technology and Services company, headquartered in Bengaluru, India.ZEPP,  the company's flagship product is an E-Commerce as a Service platform. ZEPP is now integrated through API’s with several vendors and operates Employee Purchase Programs for some of India’s largest companies as well as Student Purchase Programs for India’s premier Educational Institutions. ZEPP also partners with companies like R&R service providers, to expand its reach to Consumers. As on date ZEPP offers 100+ Brands to 2M+ Consumers.
